akas: Mob Wives: New Blood USA (fourth season title)
Mob Wives: Trust No One USA (fifth season title)
Mob Wives: The Last Stand USA (sixth season title)
akas from release info: Mob Wives: New Blood USA (fourth season title)
Mob Wives: Trust No One USA (fifth season title)
Mob Wives: The Last Stand USA (sixth season title)

1.title: Mobbed Up Mermaids
1.plot: Big Ang has been diagnosed with cancer and is recovering from throat surgery. Renee had her Mob Candy float debut and invites the girls to be on the float. At the debut, old friend Love arrives, and creates a lot of waves between the ladies

2.title: Cabin in the Woods
2.plot: Drita is forced to defend herself when she hears the slanderous allegations from the Mermaid Parade. Karen and her boyfriend Storm face difficult decisions in their tumultuous relationship. Renee brings a friend into the circle who packs a verbal punch and quickly shakes things up on a girls' weekend to the Hamptons. Drita discovers that delving into her past and writing her book is not as easy as she thought it would be.

3.title: Hamptons Hangover
3.plot: After Brittany and Marissa's confrontation, the Staten Island girls try to make the most out of their final days in the Hamptons. As Drita finds herself on the outs with her longtime friends, she quickly discovers an alliance with newcomer Brittany. While a paranormal presence makes it difficult for Renee to convince her son AJ to move back home, Ang's reckless choices of the past continue to haunt her as she struggles to get her bartending license back.

4.title: Flip-Floppers and Party Hoppers
4.plot: Ang gives Neil an ultimatum after a fight about finances. While tensions between Drita and Carla run high at Ang's birthday party, Karen continues to deal with her father's critics. Marissa voices her strong opinions about Brittany's newfound friendship with Drita.

5.title: The Sitdown
5.plot: Tired of the drama, Ang gathers the OGs in an abandoned warehouse for an old-fashioned sitdown. Renee works to convince her son and his girlfriend to move in with her. Karen finds herself in the middle of a feud between Brittany and Marissa that explodes into violence.

6.title: Younger Version of the Same Old BS
6.plot: Loyalties are called into question after Marissa and Brittany wage war on each other forcing the other women to take sides. Drita seeks out inspiration for her book, as well as Lee's blessing. Ang gets some unexpected news about her health.

7.title: Exes and Whys
7.plot: Ang receives devastating news that exposes the cracks in her marriage with Neil. Brittany's issues with Renee and Carla create a stronger alliance with Drita. A troubling rumor reopens the toxic feud between Drita and Karen.

8.title: Cuts Both Ways
8.plot: The war between Karen and Drita reaches irreparable heights when Brittany relays an explosive rumor. The women work to cheer Ang up as she faces yet another life threatening surgery. Renee takes up a new hobby.

9.title: Drittany
9.plot: Ang gives Neil an ultimatum after a fight about finances. While tensions between Drita and Carla run high at Ang's birthday party, Karen continues to deal with her father's critics. Marissa voices her strong opinions about Brittany's newfound friendship with Drita.

10.title: What's Done Is Done
10.plot: The feud between Drita and Brittany and Karen and Marissa explodes in a violent table meeting. Big Ang's cancer returns. The wives reminisce about their trials and tribulations in Staten Island as the series comes to a close.

11.title: The Final Sitdown
11.plot: Never-before-seen footage from the show's tumultuous history will be shown to the women for the very first time as they get ready for a final sitdown. Drita and Karen come together one last time to settle old scores, and Ang makes a heartfelt appearance in the midst of her intensive cancer treatment. The women will put everything out on the table and have one final chance to reconcile their differences.

1.title: Made in Staten Island
1.plot: Renee, Carla and Drita are no strangers to the good life, but now, with their husbands and fathers behind bars, they realize there is a price to pay. Karen Gravano returns to the Staten Island scene after 10 years away.

2.title: The Bitch Is Back
2.plot: The showdown continues at Carla's birthday party as Renee and Karen both refuse to back down; Drita receives shocking news from prison.

3.title: Mob Bust
3.plot: The Feds conduct the biggest mob bust in history & the fall out rocks Staten Island to its core. Renee's world starts to unravel. Karen is forced to revisit her mafia past. Drita faces the reality of her husband's jail sentence.

4.title: Do You Know Who I Am?
4.plot: Renee tempts fate by hosting a Psychic Party Carla loses control over her unruly twins & contemplates telling them the truth about their Dad's imprisonment. Renee's inner Mafia Princess is unleashed during a night out with Karen

5.title: Unfinished Business
5.plot: During a ladies' night out, "Party Renee" makes an overdue and completely wild appearance. Meanwhile, Drita comes face to face with the harsh realities of having a husband behind bars as her birthday approaches.

6.title: Dumb or Stupid?
6.plot: Karen and Drita's feud continues to simmer. When Renee invites the ladies for a "sit-down" at her table to resolve their differences, her dinner takes a disastrous hair pulling turn as disagreements escalate and everyone comes to blows!

7.title: Total Chaos
7.plot: With Carla and Renee at each other's throats, everyone is forced to put their issues on the table as the fight at Renee's house takes an unexpected turn.

8.title: Relapses, Rats & Raccoons
8.plot: Karen's writing is stalled when her book deal makes headlines. Carla prepares for her husband's imminent release from prison while Drita tries to explain the concept of a rat to her daughter.

9.title: Take This Book & Shove It
9.plot: Renee discovers Junior has been deceitful and is forced to make a decision about their future together. As Carla's husband is released from prison, she realizes that her kids are finally going to find out where he was.

10.title: Rumble on the Rooftop
10.plot: Drita continues to steam about Karen giving her the first chapter of her book and when stunning revelations about Lee surface, Drita is pushed over the edge.

11.title: Reunion Special
11.plot: They pushed each other to the brink. Now see exclusive additional footage as the cameras continue to roll and find out what happens as all four Mob Wives come face-to-face one last time.

1.title: New Year New War
1.plot: Renee is amped to finally get on the table for her full body makeover, but it suddenly turns into her plastic surgery nightmare. Drita and Carla are ready to dive into summer fun as newly single ladies. Karen finds a partner in crime in "cousin" Ramona.

2.title: Hell on Heels
2.plot: We're back on the scene at Renee's "Celebration of Life" extravaganza and Drita's make-up talk with Karen takes a vicious turn. Ramona gets hit in the crossfire. The girl fight escalates into an all out mob brawl.

3.title: Make-Ups and Break-Ups
3.plot: In the aftermath of Renee's "Celebration of Life" party, Renee takes up her issues with the ladies violent behavior and sets out to confront Carla. After a night of partying with Karen, new mob wife "cousin" Ramona goes missing.

4.title: You Don't Wanna Go to War with Me!
4.plot: With Ramona in the mix, frenemy lines are fiercely drawn between the two camps of women. Drita has a burning desire to know whether Karen punched her at Renee's party. Tempers flare & when Karen declares war, Carla the "Ice Princess" turns up the heat.

5.title: Old Friends, New Archenemies
5.plot: As tensions flare between Ramona and Carla, Drita takes further steps to finalize her divorce.

6.title: Fights and Facials
6.plot: Renee's insecurities about Junior's past cheating ways start to resurface, and with Drita's help, Renee's curiosity leads to breaking into Junior's phone.

7.title: Mob Daughters
7.plot: After an intense couples counseling session, Renee faces the harsh realities that the fairytale life with Junior she's always dreamed of may be nothing but a nightmare. Karen begins to promote her tell all book "Mob Daughter".

8.title: Tricks or Treats?
8.plot: As Halloween descends on Staten Island, things get tricky when both Ramona and Drita plan bashes to celebrate on the same night. After an explosive couples counseling session, Renee and Junior are haunted by their past.

9.title: Cabin Fever
9.plot: The girls head to the Poconos for a few days of relaxation away from the pressures of life on the Island,leaving Drita behind to curb her temper with anger management.

10.title: Fire Away
10.plot: A night out in the Poconos, erupts into a Staten Island style smackdown as Renee calls for back-up.

11.title: Torn Apart
11.plot: Carla helps Drita step into the world of dating normal men while Big Ang questions her own relationshipwith her estranged 9-5 husband.

12.title: The Ultimate Betrayal
12.plot: Just as Renee swallows the bitter pill of losing both Junior and her Father to jail, explosive rumors surrounding Junior's surrender run wild throughout the streets of Staten Island.

13.title: What Goes Around
13.plot: The rumors that have everyone on Staten Island chirping hit the New York Post, confirming that Junior is a "rat" and has been wearing a wire on Renee's father.

14.title: If Books Could Kill
14.plot: As Karen prepares for her book release party, she's left to face some harsh critics from her past while Drita is once again forced to deal with the idea that she and Lee might be in the book.

15.title: Taking the Rap
15.plot: As Renee deals with the fallout of her father taking the rap and Junior's betrayal, she becomes determined to get Karen and Drita to resolve their differences.

16.title: Of Dogs and Men
16.plot: While Karen and Drita both contemplate Renee's request to resolve their differences, Karen reveals to Ramona that she is actually considering it.

17.title: Omerta
17.plot: Both Karen and Drita are on edge as they prepare for their monumental meeting, leaving the rest of the women wondering if fists will fly once again. And when Karen and Drita finally meet, they both refuse to back down.

18.title: Reunion - Part 1
18.plot: See exclusive additional footage as the cameras continue to roll and find out what happens as all four Mob Wives come face-to-face one last time. Presented by VH1.

19.title: Reunion - Part 2
19.plot: See exclusive additional footage as the cameras continue to roll and find out what happens as all four Mob Wives come face-to-face one last time. Presented by VH1.

1.title: Mob Knives
1.plot: After a break in at her home, Renee fears that she and her son AJ are being targeted for being associated with a rat. While Drita and Karen have finally settled their differences, Drita now finds herself in the middle of a feud between Carla and Renee.

2.title: Bad Boys
2.plot: After a call from her estranged husband, Lee, Drita contemplates taking her kids to visit him in jail for the first time in years. Joe's young girlfriend is revealed and Carla learns that they are much more serious than she thought.

3.title: Threats and Thongs
3.plot: After receiving a threatening letter from Junior, Renee fears for her life and makes it her number one priority to move. Love gets together with her mother and Karen to discuss her desire to have a baby.

4.title: Of Vice and Men
4.plot: After several years since last seeing Lee, Drita and her daughters visit him in prison. Even though things seem to be cordial between Carla and Joe, he is secretly plotting to dissolve their marriage once and for all.

5.title: The Gathering Storm
5.plot: Ramona is forced to finally confront Drita over a birthday party invitation. Renee tries to turn a corner at rehab but has a hard time letting go of her anger. Back in Staten Island, Carla is stunned when Joe drops the bomb that he wants a divorce.

6.title: After the Storm
6.plot: The women wake up to a borough wrecked by the wrath of Sandy -the largest Atlantic hurricane in history. Overwhelmed by the harrowing devastation in their hometown, the women rise to the challenge by helping each other and neighbors in distress.

7.title: No Love Lost
7.plot: Karen decides to throw a pre-nup party to educate all the girls about protecting their assets and Ramona is not happy about it. When Love goes ballistic on a friend of Ramona's at Karen's pre-nup party everyone begins to fear for Carla's safety... as well as their own.

8.title: Time and Punishment
8.plot: After months of keeping it under wraps, Ramona reveals her secret engagement to Karen, but is stunned by her response. When Karen gets propositioned by her smooth studio partner sparks start to fly.

9.title: Mama Drama
9.plot: Ang's Christmas Party turns ugly as Karen and Ramona team up to confront Carla about pulling a butter knife on Renee. Renee takes the girls on a road trip to find the perfect thing to protect her family: an attack dog.

10.title: Desert Storm
10.plot: The heat is on in Arizona, as Karen moves fearlessly forward to reopen her father's case and tensions rise even higher as she faces off with Dave's new girlfriend, Rebecca, for the first time.

11.title: Winging It
11.plot: Love visits a neurologist to figure out why she is so volatile. While Carla learns of Love's ever growing animosity and questions Drita's loyalty, Renee lays the groundwork for a new, over-the-top business venture.

12.title: Crazy Love
12.plot: Karen decides to throw a pre-nup party to educate all the girls about protecting their assets and Ramona is not happy about it. When Love goes ballistic on a friend of Ramona's at Karen's pre-nup party everyone begins to fear for Carla's safety... as well as their own.

13.title: Love Hurts
13.plot: When Ramona shares her wedding plans, Karen continues to be an unwelcome voice of reason. With Drita's birthday coming up, Carla prepares for the inevitable confrontation by seeking advice from Joe. After much soul searching, Drita finally makes a decision on her future with Lee. At Drita's 80's themed birthday, the women arrive dressed to the (nineteen eighty) nines but nervous about the ongoing beef between Carla and both Love and Renee.

14.title: The Reunion
14.plot: Dr. Drew hosts and gets to the bottom of the still raw, season-ending brawl between Carla and Love. Sparks fly when Ramona and Karen reveal the reasons they can't stand Carla. Renee and her son AJ bare it all when they revisit Renee's stint in rehab.

1.title: Season Premiere
1.plot: Drita joins Ang and Renee in Philadelphia for a 1920's inspired costume party, thrown by Alicia DiMichelle Garofalo, the wife of alleged wise guy, Eddie "Tall Guy" Garofalo.

2.title: Caught On Tape
2.plot: New blood boils over as Natalie is fuming over Drita talking behind her back at Renee's fashion show. Tensions run high as the fiery South Philly beauty confronts Drita and doesn't back down.

3.title: You Smell Delicious
3.plot: Alicia does some soul searching after discovering her husband Eddie's betrayal on his federal surveillance tapes and looks to the other women for answers as she deals with the fallout.

4.title: Vegas: Part 1
4.plot: The New York girls deal with the fallout from their "girls' night out" and the growing tensions between Renee and Natalie. Meanwhile, Drita's new domestic life isn't quite as blissful as she imagined.

5.title: Vegas: Part 2
5.plot: The girls start their first morning in Las Vegas trying to get Natalie and Renee to reconcile their issues. However, Renee has very little room for forgiveness.

6.title: Vegas: Part 3
6.plot: The Vegas insanity continues. When Renee joins all the women for a day of car racing she can't handle the sight of the other girls warming up to Natalie.

7.title: Loose Lips
7.plot: Drita has a violent nightmare that she is convinced is a bad sign of things to come. Natalie reveals to Ang and Drita that Renee's apology was meaningless, and that she is still furious over Renee's admission that Renee sees her as a "piece of trash".

8.title: Eat Worms B***H
8.plot: After making her hip-hop debut alongside French Montana two years ago, Drita jumps at the opportunity to write another track inspired by her life, but finds herself at a loss for words when it's time to put the pen-to-the-pad.

9.title: Purgatory
9.plot: Natalie is having a blowout Halloween party at her funeral home and everyone is invited, including Renee, though Renee's not so sure the invite is sincere.

10.title: Life Sentences
10.plot: The day of Eddie's sentencing has finally arrived and Alicia anxiously awaits the outcome. Meanwhile, Renee meets with a lawyer to discuss possible legal options after receiving a letter from Junior and a missed phone call from jail.

11.title: Renee's Had Enough
11.plot: Drita's dinner party takes an ugly turn when Renee blames Alicia's insecurity for their issues.

12.title: Season Finale
12.plot: With Alicia's sentencing only days away, the moment she's been dreading for years is now upon her. Renee confesses that she has been writing a steamy sex novel in private and plans to have a book release party to celebrate her new venture.

13.title: The Reunion
13.plot: Hosted by Sherri Shepherd. Drita, Renee, Ang, Alicia and Natalie sit down for an explosive, often funny and shockingly intense look back at the past season.

1.title: The Realest B... Is Back
1.plot: Emotions run high and Staten Island is rife with gossip, lies, and misunderstandings. In this world, you never know what's around the corner - or when an old family connection may resurface to shake everything up.

2.title: Drunken Monkey Business
2.plot: Feeling like it's now or never Drita decides to sit down with Renee to hash out their issues, but new information shifts Drita's anger towards Natalie and she decides to address it head on. To add to her stress, Renee deals with her son AJ's reckless behavior and begins to worry about his well-being.

3.title: Storm A-Brewin'
3.plot: Karen and Natalie continue to face off at Big Ang's party igniting an even bigger rivalry between them. After the mayhem at her bar Ang is fed up with the girls and seeks some much needed advice from an unexpected source.

4.title: RATalie
4.plot: Ang and Renee try to put their differences aside with the help of Ang's surprise guest at their long awaited sit-down. While Natalie tries to inch her way closer to the Staten Island circle by making a move to New York, Karen's boyfriend Storm tries to inch his way back to her heart by trying to prove his loyalty to her.

5.title: Digging Up Dirt
5.plot: Renee begins to spiral out of control after hearing of her ex husband's latest betrayal and her son's unexpected accident that lands him in an emergency room. Drita introduces the Staten Island circle to Philadelphia local Nat D at a magazine release party from her latest gig. Meanwhile, a Philly rivalry begins to brew as Natalie G digs deeper into the new girl's personal life.

6.title: Philly vs. Philly
6.plot: After Renee and Ang's unexpected brawl at Drita's party, Karen attempts to play mediator in order to get the core Staten Island crew back together. While Ang tries to turn her attention to her new home, Natalie takes some time to focus on her business and the relationships with the men in her life. Karen digs deeper into new girl Nat D's motives and quickly discovers that she may have a trusted ally where she least expected it.

7.title: The Anti-Social Network
7.plot: Drita works on promoting her Lady Boss makeup line by organizing a photoshoot for her old school gangster themed calendar. Meanwhile, Ang tries to keep her son AJ in line after his long awaited release from Rikers Island jail. Karen and Renee's hatred toward Natalie continues to grow as the social media war spirals out of control.

8.title: Staten Island Sea Hags
8.plot: The fiery feud between Karen and Natalie continues to reach new heights causing irreparable damage in the Staten Island circle. While Renee gets word that her ex husband has been sentenced, Drita finds out some new incriminating information about her Philly friend Natalie. Things get heated at Drita's calendar party when Renee receives a text message from an unexpected source.

9.title: Forgive and Fuggedaboutit
9.plot: Renee throws a party for the one year anniversary of her fashion line where a surprise guest shows up. Drita prepares her family for a long overdue vacation while also playing middle man between enemies. Meanwhile in Arizona, Karen tries to balance her issues with her ex while working on her risky business venture. Ang attempts to gather the girls for an elaborate Thanksgiving dinner in hopes that Renee and Natalie can make amends and leave their ongoing feud behind them.

10.title: Deck the Brawls
10.plot: Drita isn't entirely sold on the new Natalie and makes a decision once and for all which Philly friend she intends to be loyal to. Natalie and her boyfriend London turn to couples therapy to try and iron out their differences and plan for their future while Renee reunites with a longtime friend from her past.

11.title: Baptisms and Betrayals
11.plot: Nat D's boyfriend makes a chilling and unexpected appearance at her home. Meanwhile, Renee decides to take her newfound peace to the next level. Karen receives a letter from her father causing her to work harder towards his early release from prison. Drita continues to maintain her loyalty to Natalie, but is pushed to the edge after her sit-down with Nat D.

12.title: The Final Face-off
12.plot: Drita struggles to keep calm after discovering Natalie's deceitful ways. Renee decides to throw a party to celebrate her spiritual cleansing and invites all the girls to join. The two Natalies nearly come face to face at Renee's party, but some unexpected guests fuel the feud and disturb the celebration.

13.title: Reunion: Part 1
13.plot: New accusations are thrown and alliances are shifted in part one of the epic two part reunion, hosted by Vivica Fox. Drita, Renee, Ang, Karen, and Natalie sit down for an explosive look back at the past season.

14.title: Reunion: Part 2
14.plot: Vivica Fox hosts as Nat D joins Drita, Renee, Ang, Karen, and Natalie for part two of the fiery reunion. The cast continues to look back at the past season and the two Philadelphia Natalie's finally come face-to-face to hash out their season long battle.

imdb.plot outline: Four women struggle with their past in their life in Staten Island, Ny. Carla Facciolo, known usually as the classy one, Ex Husband: Joey Fergganamo. Drita D'Avanzo, known usually as the tough one, Husband: Lee D'Avanzo. Karen Gravano, Father: Salvatore (Sammy "The Bull") Gravano, known usually as the defensive one. Renee Graziano, Father: Anthony Graziano, known usually as the drama queen. Throughout the seasons, we see more struggling women from Staten Island and Philadelphia, like Angela "Big Ang" Raiola, Natalie Didonato, Ramona Rizzo, and much more.
imdb.title: Mob Wives
plot: Chronicles the lives of four struggling "allegedly" associated women who have to pick up the pieces and carry on after their husbands or fathers do time for Mob-related activities.::Anonymous

Four women struggle with their past in their life in Staten Island, Ny. Carla Facciolo, known usually as the classy one, Ex Husband: Joey Fergganamo. Drita D'Avanzo, known usually as the tough one, Husband: Lee D'Avanzo. Karen Gravano, Father: Salvatore (Sammy "The Bull") Gravano, known usually as the defensive one. Renee Graziano, Father: Anthony Graziano, known usually as the drama queen. Throughout the seasons, we see more struggling women from Staten Island and Philadelphia, like Angela "Big Ang" Raiola, Natalie Didonato, Ramona Rizzo, and much more.::Robert Schantz
